LanguageData.Make_ComponentIndustrial.label: Assemble components
LanguageData.Make_ComponentAdvanced.label: Assemble advanced components
LanguageData.Make_ComponentAdvanced.description: Assemble advanced components from metal. Produces 10.
LanguageData.Make_ComponentSpacer.label: Assemble spacer components
LanguageData.Make_ComponentSpacer.description: Assemble spacer components from metal. Produces 10.
LanguageData.Make_ComponentUltra.label: Assemble ultra components
LanguageData.Make_ComponentUltra.description: Assemble ultra components from metal. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeWires_Hand.label: Craft wires
LanguageData.MakeWires_Hand.description: Craft wires from high conductivity metals. Quite slow. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeWires_Electric.label: Craft wires
LanguageData.MakeWires_Electric.description: Craft wires from high conductivity metals. Quite fast. Produces 40.
LanguageData.MakeSand_Hand.label: crush rubble into sand
LanguageData.MakeSand_Hand.description: Crush rubble to obtain sand. Quite slow. Produces 25.
LanguageData.MakeSand_Electric.label: crush rubble into sand
LanguageData.MakeSand_Electric.description: Crush rubble to obtain sand. Quite fast. Produces 50.
LanguageData.MakeSand_Hand_Chunk.label: pulverize chunks into sand
LanguageData.MakeSand_Hand_Chunk.description: Obtain sand by pulverizing a chunk of stone. Quite slow. Produces 80.
LanguageData.MakeSand_Electric_Chunk.label: pulverize chunks into sand
LanguageData.MakeSand_Electric_Chunk.description: Obtain sand by pulverizing a chunk of stone. Quite fast. Produces 80.
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Hand.label: crush blocks into rubble
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Hand.description: Crush stone blocks into rubble. Quite slow. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Electric.label: crush blocks into rubble
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Electric.description: Crush stone blocks into rubble. Quite fast. Produces 40.
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Hand_Chunk.label: crush chunks into rubble
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Hand_Chunk.description: Crush stone chunks into rubble. Quite slow. Produces 32.
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Electric_Chunk.label: crush chunks into rubble
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Electric_Chunk.descript: Crush stone chunks into rubble. Quite slow. Produces 32.
LanguageData.MakeReinforcedConcrete_Hand.label: create reinforced concrete
LanguageData.MakeReinforcedConcrete_Hand.description: Create reinforced concrete from concrete and metal. Quite slow. Produces 8.
LanguageData.MakeReinforcedConcrete_Electric.label: create reinforced concrete
LanguageData.MakeReinforcedConcrete_Electric.descript: Create reinforced concrete from concrete and metal. Quite fast. Produces 16.
LanguageData.MakeSimpleMechanism_Hand.label: Assemble mechanisms
LanguageData.MakeSimpleMechanism_Hand.description: Assemble mechanisms. Mechanisms are simple gear-like parts for use in machines or workbenches. Quite slow. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeSimpleMechanism_Electric.label: Assemble mechanisms
LanguageData.MakeSimpleMechanism_Electric.description: Assemble mechanisms. Mechanisms are simple gear-like parts for use in machines or workbenches. Quite fast. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeAdvMechanism_Hand.label: Assemble advanced mechanisms
LanguageData.MakeAdvMechanism_Hand.description: Assemble advanced mechanisms. Advanced mechanisms are intricate gear-like parts for use in complex machines or workbenches. Quite slow. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeAdvMechanism_Electric.label: Assemble advanced mechanisms
LanguageData.MakeAdvMechanism_Electric.description: Assemble advanced mechanisms. Advanced mechanisms are intricate gear-like parts for use in complex machines or workbenches. Quite fast. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeMetalCan.label: craft metal cans
LanguageData.MakeMetalCan.description: Craft cans from metal. Cans are typically used to preserve food when there are no freezers nearby. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeMendingKit.label: craft mending kits
LanguageData.MakeMendingKit.description: Craft mending kits from various materials. Produces enough to re-stock the mending table.
